verbs.description: < p > [ARG1: U.S. stocks] [V: fell] [ARG2: sharply] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump announced that the hotly anticipated summit next month with North Korea was cancelled.</p >]
